title: Barbershop Quartet (LIVE with Alonzo Bodden, Hoodo Hersi, + Jay Jurden)
itunes:title: Barbershop Quartet (LIVE with Alonzo Bodden, Hoodo Hersi, + Jay Jurden)
description:
My Momma Told Me goes LIVE for the first time at Montreal's Just For Laughs Festival. Join Langston and his guests Alonzo Bodden (Stupid Don't Get Tired on YouTube), Hoodo Hersi (Late Night with Seth Meyers), and Jay Jurden (The Problem with Jon Stewart) as they chime in on a variety of devastating and funny Black conspiracy theories. Take away: you better know pink lotion. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
My Momma Told Me goes LIVE for the first time at Montreal's Just For Laughs Festival. Join Langston and his guests Alonzo Bodden (Stupid Don't Get Tired on YouTube), Hoodo Hersi (Late Night with Seth Meyers), and Jay Jurden (The Problem with Jon Stewart) as they chime in on a variety of devastating and funny Black conspiracy theories. Take away: you better know pink lotion. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
itunes:keywords: Langston Kerman, Alonzo Bodden, Hoodo Hersi, Jay Jurden, Just for Laughs, Just for Laughs Festival, Comedy Festivals, Live Show, Live Podcast, White Devil, Black Conspiracy Theories, Late Night with Seth Meyers, The Problem with Jon Stewart, YouTube Comedy Specials, Stupid Don't Get Tired, Comedians Chatting, Pause with Sam Jay, Variety's 10 Comedians
